å·´ï¼›Spanish radio station Cadena Cope claim Mbappe had his heart set on a move to the Nou Camp.

Football agent Josep Maria Minguella told the show Mbappe only considered a move to Barcelona as his preferred destination and had already ruled out a move to Real Madrid due to concerns over a lack of playing time.

It is said Mbappe’s father told Barcelona they were the only club he wanted to join and the La Liga giants could have closed a deal for an initial fee of £107m plus £27m in add-ons.

çš‡ï¼šAccording to respected Spanish journalist Hector Fernandez, Mbappe wanted £200,000-a-week to join the Bernabeu.

But Real simply responded: “Congratulations and good luck in Paris.”

å·´ï¼›Spanish radio station Cadena Cope claim Mbappe had his heart set on a move to the Nou Camp.
